mapper.insert: insert into `task` (username, kind, priority, content, note, tag, start, finish, warn, state) values(#{username}, #{kind}, #{priority}, #{content}, #{note}, #{tag}, #{start}, #{finish}, #{warn}, #{state})
mapper.update: update `task` set username = #{username}, kind = #{kind}, priority = #{priority}, content = #{content}, note = #{note}, tag = #{tag}, start = #{start}, finish = #{finish}, warn = #{warn}, state = #{state} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM task WHERE username = #{username} AND state = '未完成'
